  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 or AMD RADEON RX 470 (These are for 1080p resolution, lowest graphics settings and 60 FPS most of the time)

  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Additional Notes: This game needs all Windows updates installed. For 2 player local co-op, a second gamepad is necessary.

  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended. For 2 player local co-op, a second gamepad is necessary.
